Actors: Daniel Day-Lewis, Sally Field, David Strathairn, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
Writer: Tony Kushner (screenplay by), Doris Kearns Goodwin (based in part on the book "Team of Rivals: The Political Genius of Abraham Lincoln" by)
Title: Lincoln
Plot: As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.
